name: untitled mage game prototype
description:
hi!

this is a start of a game I am working on, the idea is a game controlled only by the mouse, left click to shoot, right click to teleport to mouse position.

this  is a super early build,  pretty much just to show friends and family for playtest, my plan is to keep exploring the idea more, because there are many ways to expend on it.

like most early builds, probably going to have bugs mostly in camera and UI placement.

cool, have fun playing, bye.
